name: ocmui-team-dashboard
description: OCMUI Team Dashboard - JIRA/GitHub integration, team timezones, and productivity tools

scripts.start: yarn build; lsof -ti:3017 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; node server/index.js & sleep 2 && open http://localhost:3017 && wait
scripts.start:dev: lsof -ti:3017 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; webpack serve --mode development --hot --port 3017
